item.title: Agile - Should we track more than just development?
item.description: I touched earlier on the transparency of agile and I’ve been thinking about some of the ways that we track/report information in agile projects. In all the projects I’ve been involved in the data being tracked almost exclusively referred to development time. One of the advantages of having continuous analysis/development/testing is that we are able to reduce the time spent on the System Integration and User Acceptance Testing phases of the project.
